channel.title: CVE Feed for WellinTech -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WellinTech -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-43663|2024-07-31T20:12:43.557Z -- wellintech -- kinghistorian
item.description: An integer conversion vulnerability exists in the SORBAx64.dll RecvPacket functionality of WellinTech KingHistorian 35.01.00.05. A specially crafted network packet can lead to a buffer overflow. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-45124|2024-07-31T20:12:56.168Z -- wellintech -- kinghistorian
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the User authentication functionality of WellinTech KingHistorian 35.01.00.05. A specially crafted network packet can lead to a disclosure of sensitive information. An attacker can sniff network traffic to leverage this vulnerability.
